english_example_sentence: You, the hardworking team, would have successfully managed this challenging project.
russian_example_sentence: Вы, трудолюбивая команда, успешно справились бы с этим сложным проектом.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, o çalışkan ekip, bu zorlu projeyi başarıyla kaldıracaktınız.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz, o çalışkan ekip, bu zorlu projeyi başarıyla ______.
